welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Merate, a quaint and charming city in the heart of Italy. Known for its stunning architecture, delicious cuisine, and warm hospitality, we invite you to immerse yourself in all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay and discover the beauty of Merate!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bergamo - Orio al Serio Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Bergamo - Orio al Serio Airport, mainly used by low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for budget airlines and some domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lugano Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The General Aviation Terminal at Lugano Airport provides services for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
